info.name: Electric Google
info.description: This script modifies the Google logo.

style.css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("google.com"),
domain("googlecode.com"),
domain("google.de"),
domain("google.com.hk"),
domain("google.com.br"),
domain("google.it"),
domain("google.pl"),
domain("google.ps"),
domain("google.fr"),
domain("google.be"),
domain("google.es"),
domain("google.ru"),
domain("google.ca"),
domain("google.nl"),
domain("google.cn"),
domain("google.co.uk"),
domain("google.co.in"),
domain("google.co.ve"),
domain("google.co.za"),
domain("google.co.th"),
domain("google.com.my"),
domain("google.com.eg"),
domain("google.com.pk"),
domain("google.com.ar"),
domain("google.com.mx"),
domain("google.com.sa"),
domain("google.co.id"),
domain("google.com.tr"),
domain("google.com.au"),
domain("googleusercontent.com"),
domain("chromium.org"),
domain("gstatic.com")

  {

  #hplogo, #gbqlw img
  { 	
    display: none;
  }

/* The logo was created by fynnbb.co.de */
#body
  {
    background: url(http://www.abload.de/img/google_fynnbbjyzmw.jpg) no-repeat center top !important;
  }

}
